title: Building basic program using datafusion results in linker panic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
```
note: rustc 1.30.0-nightly (33b923fd4 2018-08-18) running on x86_64-apple-darwin
note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C lto --crate-type bin
```

```
$ cat Cargo.toml 
[package]
name = "ndarray-csv-reader"
version = "0.1.0"
authors = ["Ewan Higgs <ewan_higgs@some-email-provider>"]

[dependencies]
arrow = "*"
datafusion = "*"

[profile.release]
opt-level = 3
lto = true
```

```
extern crate arrow;
extern crate datafusion;

use arrow::datatypes::*;
use datafusion::exec::*;

use std::env;

fn main() {
    let ctx = ExecutionContext::local();
    let schema = Schema::new(vec![
                             Field::new("0", DataType::Utf8, false),
                             Field::new("1", DataType::Utf8, false),
                             Field::new("2", DataType::Utf8, false),
                             Field::new("3", DataType::Utf8, false),
                             Field::new("4", DataType::Utf8, false),
    ]);

    let fpath = env::args().nth(1).unwrap();
    let df1 = ctx
        .load_csv(&fpath, &schema, false, None)
        .unwrap();
    println!("df1: {}", df1.schema().to_string());
    df1.show(10);

}
```

```
   Compiling ndarray-csv-reader v0.1.0 (file:///Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader)
     Running `rustc --crate-name ndarray_csv_reader src/main.rs --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C opt-level=3 -C lto -C metadata=079e0df49abc13ae -C extra-filename=-079e0df49abc13ae --out-dir /Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/  ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/deps -L dependency=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/deps --extern arrow=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/deps/libarrow-         b88108540943c586.rlib --extern datafusion=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/deps/libdatafusion-8ef2a8f5161810d2.rlib -L native=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/   build/miniz-sys-d0544425f1697f69/out -L native=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/build/lz4-sys-09a968ec9628aa73/out -L native=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/    build/zstd-sys-676b8bbb2312f44b/out`
thread 'main' panicked at 'assertion failed: !are_upstream_rust_objects_already_included(sess)', librustc_codegen_llvm/back/link.rs:1533:9
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.30.0-nightly (33b923fd4 2018-08-18) running on x86_64-apple-darwin

note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C lto --crate-type bin

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden
                                                                                
error: Could not compile `ndarray-csv-reader`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name ndarray_csv_reader src/main.rs --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C opt-level=3 -C lto -C metadata=079e0df49abc13ae -C extra-filename=-079e0df49abc13ae --out-dir /Users/ehiggs/  src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/deps -L dependency=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/deps --extern arrow=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/deps/libarrow-b88108540943c586.rlib --extern datafusion=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/deps/libdatafusion-8ef2a8f5161810d2.rlib -L native=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/    target/release/build/miniz-sys-d0544425f1697f69/out -L native=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/target/release/build/lz4-sys-09a968ec9628aa73/out -L native=/Users/ehiggs/src/home/csv-game/rust/ndarray-csv-reader/    target/release/build/zstd-sys-676b8bbb2312f44b/out` (exit code: 101)
```
